Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product is not just any item; it's a game-changer that promises to streamline your daily tasks and enhance your productivity significantly. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering this exclusive opportunity at an introductory price of $199. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $199. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $199
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
